CIPHER.0.cipherString: I don't know anywhere where the people are hungrier for education than South Sudan.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: If thou shouldst never see my face again, Pray for my soul. More things are wrought by prayer Than this world dreams of.
CIPHER.1.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(23,9).

CIPHER.2.cipherString: The word love has by no means the same sense for both sexes, and this is one cause of the serious misunderstandings that divide them.
CIPHER.2.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(5,13).

CIPHER.3.cipherString: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth.
CIPHER.3.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(7,11).

CIPHER.4.cipherString: It's amazing. I can't believe how brilliant the whole thing is - my daughter, Georgia, is just wonderful.
CIPHER.4.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(7,9).

CIPHER.5.cipherString: The virtual world is not the enemy. The pioneers invented a world they believed in, but the followers must follow that world whether they believe in it or not.
CIPHER.5.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(9,23).

CIPHER.6.cipherString: The reading of all good books is like a conversation with the finest minds of past centuries.
CIPHER.6.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(21,23).

CIPHER.7.cipherString: I came from the music business, which reputedly has the biggest egos, but I really think the airline world caps it.
CIPHER.7.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(11,5).

CIPHER.8.cipherString: Social advance depends as much upon the process through which it is secured as upon the result itself.
CIPHER.8.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(15,13).

CIPHER.9.cipherString: All happy families resemble one another, each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
CIPHER.9.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(15,22).

CIPHER.10.cipherString: At every party there are two kinds of people - those who want to go home and those who don't. The trouble is, they are usually married to each other.
CIPHER.10.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(19,13).

CIPHER.11.cipherString: I like to listen. I have learned a great deal from listening carefully. Most people never listen.
CIPHER.11.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(5,24).

CIPHER.12.cipherString: It wasn't my tennis that made me lose, it was a lot of different things going on, high drama, high emotion.
CIPHER.12.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(23,11).

CIPHER.13.cipherString: I can write a program that lets you break the copy protection on a music file. But I can't write a program that solders new connections onto a chip for you.
CIPHER.13.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(21,15).

CIPHER.14.cipherString: Red Sox fans have been pushed to the brink over the years, but that's how faith grows stronger.
CIPHER.14.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(3,15).

CIPHER.15.cipherString: It started when I woke up, all I wanted to do is jump out of the window. I didn't want to eat anymore, because I was afraid that I might poison myself somehow.
CIPHER.15.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(3,22).

CIPHER.16.cipherString: Each has his own tree of ancestors, but at the top of all sits Probably Arboreal.
CIPHER.16.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(23,21).

CIPHER.17.cipherString: The armies, the difference of all of those armies that had been fighting each other and the Taliban took advantage of that to rule over the whole country.
CIPHER.17.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(9,20).

CIPHER.18.cipherString: Age is strictly a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
CIPHER.18.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(19,15).

CIPHER.19.cipherString: It is better to debate a question without settling it than to settle a question without debating it.
CIPHER.19.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(7,15).

CIPHER.20.cipherString: I've never worried about being typecast - I've only ever worried about being not cast!
CIPHER.20.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(21,18).
